title: Compare margin of error for different size samples

content.prompt: If the point estimate obtained from R is equal to the point estimate obtained from S, which of the following must be true about the respective margins of error constructed from those samples?

choices.label: The margin of error for S will be 4 times the margin of error for R.
The margin of error for S will be 2 times the margin of error for R.
The margin of error for S will be equal to the margin of error for R.
The margin of error for R will be 4 times the margin of error for S.
The margin of error for R will be 2 times the margin of error for S.

topic.text: 6.3: Justifying a Claim Based on a Confidence Interval for a Population Proportion

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Make an appropriate claim or draw an appropriate conclusion.
